item.description:
Photoshoot at Robert's Salon and Spa, Dollhouse themed in time for Spring :)
When we were little (meaning us girls), we enjoyed the imaginary life style of creating designs for our little, imaginary clients. Welcome to the world of our fashion team, a dream come true :)

Our next photoshoot will feature models who will be made up to be dollies in the salon. It is the ultimate game of dress up:)


Each model will have a unique, doll-inspired look.


Vintage-inspired wardrobe for the models will be provided by REVOLVE BOUTIQUE in Belmont, MA.


Time: 3pm-6:30pm


Models (models who have R.S.V.P. and may subject to change): Caitlin, Colleen C., Amanda N., Jessica, Ashley M., Jenny

Please arrive at the salon at 12pm for hair design and make up application.To schedule a fitting with REVOLVE, please contact the store at 617-484-7900

Attention Models:
Can you please contact me to discuss the fittings at REVOLVE in Belmont, Ma that will be taking place within the next two weeks up to the date of the shoot (April 14) . You may call me or emailme with any questions. Please call Siobhan directly to schedule a fitting. Please contact Siobhan (pronouced Shavaugn)at  siobhanclune@yahoo.com The store location is at

 59 Leonard Street
Belmont MA 02478

The store number is: 617.484.7900
 
They are open from:

MONDAY thru SATURDAY
9:30 AM - 7:00 PM
 
SUNDAY
12:00 PM - 5:00 PM

 

Photographers: Please arrive at the salon around 3:00. The photoshoot will start around that time.

Cost : $55.00

Coffee, tea and light refreshments will be served.
item.name: Doll House Photoshoot
